mapper.select: select * from Input_WareHouse_Detail order by no desc

select iw.no, iw.input_warehouse_no,iw.purchase_Sheet_No, iw.qty, it.code item_code, it.name item_name, iw.status , iw.lot_code, w.name as ware_name, a.name as area_name, r.name as rack_name, c.name as cell_name from(select * from input_warehouse_detail where input_warehouse_no = #{mainNo}) iw inner join item it on iw.item_no = it.no inner join (select * from warehouse) w on iw.ware_no = w.no inner join (select * from area) a on iw.area_no = a.no inner join (select * from rack) r on iw.rack_no = r.no inner join (select * from cell) c on iw.cell_no = c.no
